issue.title: Fix Container::resolveCallableDependencies() unable to handle union t…

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
…ypes

| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | ✔️
| New feature?  | ✔️
| Breaks BC?    | ❌
| Fixed issues  | [19004](https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/issues/19004)

Container::resolveCallableDependencies() can be used now with union types in arguments
If more than one interfaces can satisfy type rule, than first one will be used
